description: (T1) Sycamore (TPO) - Growing in close proximity and encroaching on Church building and neighbouring property. Reduce height of crown by up to 3.5m and radial spread by 2.5m to previous pollard points, so that final height is 16.5m and radial spread is 2.5m, to manage size of tree and to provide sufficient clearance to property.(T2) Lime (TPO) -  Growing in close proximity and encroaching on Church building and neighbouring property. Remove epicormic growth and reduce height of crown by up to 3.5m and radial spread by 2.5m to previous pollard points, so that final height is 16.5m and radial spread is 1.5m, to manage size of tree and to provide sufficient clearance to property.(T3) Lime (TPO) -  Growing in close proximity and encroaching on Church building and neighbouring property. Remove epicormic growth and reduce height of crown by up to 3.5m and radial spread by 2.5m to previous pollard points, so that final height is 16.5m and radial spread is 1.5m, to manage size of tree and to provide sufficient clearance to property(T4) Lime (TPO) -  Growing in close proximity and encroaching on Church building and neighbouring property. Remove epicormic growth and reduce height of crown by up to 3.5m and radial spread by 2.5m to previous pollard points, so that final height is 17.5m and radial spread is 2m, to manage size of tree and to provide sufficient clearance to property.
